description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/releases/list-an-organizations-releases/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/releases/list-an-organizations-releases/)

Return a list of releases for a given organization.

### Path Parameters

`organization_slug` *(string)* REQUIRED

The slug of the organization.

### Query Parameters:

`query` *(string)*

This parameter can be used to create a "starts with" filter for the version.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `project:releases`
